author: bachtis
body: There are some extreme cases where the track is propagated to the HCAL barrel entrance and then to the HCAL endcap case . It can happen to loopers . In this case an exception was thrown in linking . NOw we link those specific  tracks as well but only using  the first point they did hit ignoring the exit point . Ignoring the exit point just results in more strict linking which doesnt really matter because those are really low pt tracks.
title: Fix issue with weird linking case crashing reprocessing
